bm_desc: To consider other business matters

Pursuant to the applicable provisions of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Infrastructure Investment Trusts) Regulations, 2014, ( InvIT Regulations ) as amended from time to time read with circulars and guidelines issued thereunder and any other law as may be applicable, we hereby inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of IndiGrid Investment Managers Limited acting in the capacity of Investment Manager to IndiGrid Infrastructure Trust ( IndiGrid ) is scheduled to be held on Monday, December 08, 2025, to consider and approve raising of funds through various sources as may be permitted under applicable law.
Meeting of Securities Issue Committee to be held on December 08, 2025
To consider Fund Raising and other business matters
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025

SDBL : 08-Dec-2025 :  The Company has informed the Exchange that a Board meeting to be held on December 11, 2025 has been re-scheduled. Further, the Company has informed the Exchange that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on December 08, 2025,  To consider other business matters
To consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended  June 30, 2025 and September 30, 2025
To consider Fund Raising
To consider and approve the Standalone and consolidated financial results of the Company for the Quarter and Half Year ended September 30, 2025
Intimation of Meeting of the Preferential Issue Committee for allotment of equity sharespursuant to conversion of warrants into Equity Shares.

To consider and approve the Audited Financial Statements of the Company for the financial year ended March 31, 2025, together with the reports of the Board of Directors and Auditors thereon and to consider any other item, if any in the Monitoring Committee Meeting scheduled to be held on Tuesday, 09th December, 2025.
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
Intimation of Board Meeting in compliance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 on Wednesday, 10th December, 2025.
To consider Fund Raising through issue of Unsecured Non-Convertible Debentures on private placement basis.
To consider Fund Raising

To consider the matters to approve / accept the Rights issue offer of Equity shares worth Rs.49.99 Crores made by Woodpecker Greenagri Nutrients Pvt Ltd. (WGNPL), Wholly Owned Subsidiary of the Company
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025
To consider declaration of interim dividend for the financial year 2025-2026.
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025
To consider and approve the financial results for the period ended December 31, 2025
